title: NO FEE! Newly Renovated 4 bed, 2 bath w/ in unit laundry - Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301107437', 'Rent: $4,800 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: no parking', 'No Broker Fee!', 'Contact Zach at 607-342-5872, if interested.', 'This is a newly renovated 4 bed, 2 bathroom apartment with in unit laundry in East Somerville.', 'Pet Friendly!', '--', 'Zach Feldshuh', 'Associate', 'O: 617.314.9400', 'C: 607-342-5872', 'Senné LinkedIn', 'Email shall neither constitute acceptance of conducting transactions via electronic means nor create a binding contract unless a written contract is signed by the parties.', 'Pictures used in our marketing may occasionally be of model units.', 'Apartment availability, features and amenities subject to variation and change.', 'Contact posting agent for the most current and accurate information available.', '- Senné']
